lead_paragraph: She said Germany would achieve that “historic” task while defending freedom and democracy against the hate sown by terrorists.

headline.print_headline: After Attacks, Merkel Sticks With Vow to Integrate Migrants
headline.main: Angela Merkel Sticks With Her Plan to Integrate Migrants

snippet: She said Germany would achieve that “historic” task while defending freedom and democracy against the hate sown by terrorists....
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel introduces nine-point plan to integrate migrants, defend freedom and improve national security at her annual summer news conference; proposal addresses country's climate of fear following three recent violent attacks, two linked to Islamic State terrorists and one to anti-immigration.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
